channel.title: Port Forwarding [I Have used other guides] , they dont work
channel.description:
Hi, i always wanted to run my own server, then the obvious happened i got a new 'wire-less' router. I have lots of experience in java coding and have many of my own servers that friends run, when i got the new router at first i tried to fix it but then it just never worked now i have pt my head down and i am going to get this problem fixed. Ok, the router i have is a 'Bt Home Hub' , what i do is, go into the router control panel, then i go to application and game sharing, then i add a new exception, the exception is this: Protocol Port Range Translate To ... Trigger Protocol Trigger Port
Any 43594 - 43595 43594 - 43595 - -
I have tried several times and it always fails to work, i will do anything to get this working, please email me at admin@weedscape.co.uk or reply to me on here. Help would be appreciated many thanks, Alex.

item.title: Port Forwarding [I Have used other guides] , they dont work
item.dc:creator: @AlexLast AlexLast
item.description:
@AlexLast wrote:

Hi, i always wanted to run my own server, then the obvious happened i got a new ‘wire-less’ router.
I have lots of experience in java coding and have many of my own servers that friends run, when i got the new router at first i tried to fix it but then it just never worked now i have pt my head down and i am going to get this problem fixed.
Ok, the router i have is a ‘Bt Home Hub’ , what i do is, go into the router control panel, then i go to application and game sharing, then i add a new exception, the exception is this:
Protocol Port Range Translate To … Trigger Protocol Trigger Port

Any 43594 - 43595 43594 - 43595 - -

I have tried several times and it always fails to work, i will do anything to get this working, please email me at admin@weedscape.co.uk or reply to me on here. Help would be appreciated many thanks, Alex.
